resources.string: \.Gas pressure will be checked before start of service\n\.Filter,drain pipe and outer panel will be cleaned \.Cooling coils and condenser coils will be cleaned \.Any water leakage in the drains will be checked carefully \.Performance of the AC will be checked post service

\. Gas pressure will be checked before start of the service \. Outdoor unit will be checked for any debris, and it will be cleaned \. Filter, drain tray and outer panel will be cleaned \. Blower wheels, blades and cooling coils will be cleaned \. Any water leakage in drain pipe will be checked carefully \. High pressure jet pumps, will not be used for this service \. Performance of the AC will be checked post service

\. Prices mentioneed are only labour cost,spare parts cost will be extra \. The professionals do not carry chairs and stools and may ask for them during servicing and installations. \.Basis on the thickness and the internal filling of the wall sometimes the professionals need to use core cutting machine for making the provision for split AC and the charges for the same will be charged at actual.

\. Provision for installing window AC in the wall or the window needs to be done by a carpanter or a mason. AC professionals will not do this. \. AC will be installed by professionals, and its performance will be checked \. Gas pressure will be checked post installation
\. AC will be checked once before unistallation \. In-case of window AC, the provision needs to be closed by the customer
\. Fixed charge for installation, uninstallation and servicing \. Repair Services:- Pricing will be based on inspection
